Package ec.co.ant

Class ProportionateComponentSelector

java.lang.Object
ec.co.ant.ProportionateComponentSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentSelector, Setup, Serializable
public class ProportionateComponentSelector extends Object implements ComponentSelector, Setup
Provides a function that chooses a Component stochastically in the style of Ant System. Each component's probability of being chosen is proportional to the product of its phereomone concentration and its heuristic desirability, each weighted according to an exponential scaling factor (alpha and beta, respectively).
Author:
Eric O. Scott
